text: Peri Kay Oldham (also known as Peri Gilpin; born May 27, 1961) is an American actress. She acts mostly television. She played Roz Doyle in the sitcom Frasier beginning in 1993 - ending in 2004. Gilpin was born in Waco, Texas. Category:American television actors Category:Actors from Texas Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:People from Waco, Texas
title: Peri Gilpin
